# Page

Represent PDF Page

# Methods

# addWatermark(Page overlayPage, Position position=BACKGROUND)

Add overlay page as watermark to this page

  • Props:
    • overlayPage- Page
      any page can be used as overlay
    • position- Position, defaults to "BACKGROUND"
      FOREGROUND or BACKGROUND
  • Returns: Page

# crop(Region region)

Crop the page

  • Props:
    • region- Region
  • Returns: Page

# height(Number h=null)

Get/Set Height of page in user defined unit

  • Props:
    • h- Number, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: Number

# resize(PaperSize | Number size, Boolean resizePage=true, Boolean resizeContent=true, BasePoint basePoint=CENTER)

Scale to paper size

  • Props:
    • size- PaperSize | Number
    • resizePage- Boolean, defaults to "true"
    • resizeContent- Boolean, defaults to "true"
    • basePoint- BasePoint, defaults to "CENTER"
  • Returns: Page

# rotate(Number rotation=null)

Get/Set Rotation a page in clockwise direction

  • Props:
    • rotation- Number, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: Number

# toImage(Number scale=100)

Convert page to image

  • Props:
    • scale- Number, defaults to "100"
  • Returns: Image

# translate(Number tx, Number ty)

Scale page in x and/or y direction with basepoint

  • Props:
    • tx- Number
    • ty- Number
  • Returns: Page

# width(Number w=null)

Get/Set Width of page in mm

  • Props:
    • w- Number, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: Number

# addImage(String | Image image, Point | Region at, Number width=null, Number height=null, Number rotate=0, Number opacity=1, Boolean inline=false)

Add image at particular location

  • Props:
    • image- String | Image
      Can be String/Image type
    • at- Point | Region
      Can be Point/Region type
    • width- Number, defaults to "null"
      default null, either derive from Region or Actual Width
    • height- Number, defaults to "null"
      default null, either derive from Region or Actual Height
    • rotate- Number, defaults to "0"
      Rotation such as 0, 90, 270 etc
    • opacity- Number, defaults to "1"
      Opacity (transparency from 0
    • inline- Boolean, defaults to "false"
      if true, then image will drawn as inline
  • Returns: Page

# changeImage(Region region=null, String | Image image=null, Point moveBy=null, Number rotateBy=0, BasePoint rotateBasePoint=CENTER, Number scale=100, BasePoint scaleBasePoint=CENTER)

Change existing image within region

  • Props:
    • region- Region, defaults to "null"
    • image- String | Image, defaults to "null"
      Can be String/Image type
    • moveBy- Point, defaults to "null"
    • rotateBy- Number, defaults to "0"
    • rotateBasePoint- BasePoint, defaults to "CENTER"
    • scale- Number, defaults to "100"
    • scaleBasePoint- BasePoint, defaults to "CENTER"
  • Returns: List<Image>

# deleteImages(Region region=null)

Delete all images within region

  • Props:
    • region- Region, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: List<Image>

# extractImages(Region region=null)

Extract all images within region

  • Props:
    • region- Region, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: List<Image>

# addText(String | List<String> text, Point | Region at, String | Font font=HELVETICA, Number fontSize=12, Number rotate=0, Color color=null, Number opacity=1, Boolean justify=false, Number leading=null )

Add text at particular location

  • Props:
    • text- String | List<String>
      it can be "abc" or ["abc", "def"]
    • at- Point | Region
      Point or Region type, if region then text get wrapped around
    • font- String | Font, defaults to "HELVETICA"
    • fontSize- Number, defaults to "12"
    • rotate- Number, defaults to "0"
    • color- Color, defaults to "null"
    • opacity- Number, defaults to "1"
    • justify- Boolean, defaults to "false"
      justify text, if wrapped around
    • leading- Number, defaults to "null"
      if null, leading space calculated automatically
  • Returns: Page

# changeText(Region region, Color color=null, Point moveBy=null, String | Font font=null, Number fontSize=null)

Change text within region

  • Props:
    • region- Region
    • color- Color, defaults to "null"
    • moveBy- Point, defaults to "null"
    • font- String | Font, defaults to "null"
    • fontSize- Number, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: List<List<Text>>

# deleteText(Region region=null)

Extract text relative to another text

  • Props:
    • region- Region, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: List<List<Text>>

# extractText(Region region=null, Boolean trimSpaces=true)

Extract text within region

  • Props:
    • region- Region, defaults to "null"
    • trimSpaces- Boolean, defaults to "true"
  • Returns: String

# extractTextDefinition(Region region=null)

Extract text definition within region

  • Props:
    • region- Region, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: List<List<Text>>

# findAndReplaceText(String find, String replace=null, Region region=null, Color color=null, Point moveBy=null, String | Font font=null, Number fontSize=null, Boolean caseSensitive=false)

Find text and then replace/delete it, within region/page

  • Props:
    • find- String
    • replace- String, defaults to "null"
    • region- Region, defaults to "null"
    • color- Color, defaults to "null"
    • moveBy- Point, defaults to "null"
    • font- String | Font, defaults to "null"
    • fontSize- Number, defaults to "null"
    • caseSensitive- Boolean, defaults to "false"
  • Returns: List<List<Text>>

# findText(String find, Region region=null, Boolean caseSensitive=false)

Find text within region/page

  • Props:
    • find- String
      text to be find
    • region- Region, defaults to "null"
      if null, find in whole page
    • caseSensitive- Boolean, defaults to "false"
      by default false
  • Returns: List<List<Text>>

# replaceText(Region region, List<String> text, Color color=null, Point moveBy=null, String | Font font=null, Number fontSize=null)

Replace text within region

  • Props:
    • region- Region
    • text- List<String>
    • color- Color, defaults to "null"
    • moveBy- Point, defaults to "null"
    • font- String | Font, defaults to "null"
    • fontSize- Number, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: List<List<Text>>

# addBarcode(BarcodeType type, String content, Point | Region at, Number rotate=0, Number modWidth=null, Number barHeight=null, String fontName=null, Number fontSize=null, HumanReadableLocation location=null)

Add Barcode in a PDF page at location

  • Props:
    • type- BarcodeType
    • content- String
    • at- Point | Region
    • rotate- Number, defaults to "0"
    • modWidth- Number, defaults to "null"
    • barHeight- Number, defaults to "null"
    • fontName- String, defaults to "null"
    • fontSize- Number, defaults to "null"
    • location- HumanReadableLocation, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: Page

# addRectangleAnnotation(Region region, Color color=RED, Number opacity=0.5f, Number borderWidth=null, Color borderColor=null, Boolean flatten=false, String content=null)

Add Rectangle annotation

  • Props:
    • region- Region
    • color- Color, defaults to "RED"
    • opacity- Number, defaults to "0.5f"
    • borderWidth- Number, defaults to "null"
    • borderColor- Color, defaults to "null"
    • flatten- Boolean, defaults to "false"
    • content- String, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: Page

# addTextAnnotation(TextMarkupType textMarkUp, Region region, Color color=null, Number opacity=null, Number borderWidth=null, Boolean flatten=false)

Add Text annotation.

  • Props:
    • textMarkUp- TextMarkupType
    • region- Region
    • color- Color, defaults to "null"
    • opacity- Number, defaults to "null"
    • borderWidth- Number, defaults to "null"
    • flatten- Boolean, defaults to "false"
  • Returns: Page

# flattenAnnotation(Region region=null)

Flatten all annotation within region

  • Props:
    • region- Region, defaults to "null"
  • Returns: Page

# removeAnnotation(Region region)

Remove all annotation within region

  • Props:
    • region- Region
  • Returns: Page

# findAndRedactText(String find, Region region=null, Color color=BLACK, Boolean caseSensitive=false)

Find and Redact text within region

  • Props:
    • find- String
      text to be found
    • region- Region, defaults to "null"
    • color- Color, defaults to "BLACK"
      default color black
    • caseSensitive- Boolean, defaults to "false"
  • Returns: Page

# redact(Region region=null, Color color=BLACK)

Redact both text and image a region

  • Props:
    • region- Region, defaults to "null"
    • color- Color, defaults to "BLACK"
  • Returns: Page

# redactImage(Region region=null, Color color=BLACK)

Redact images within region

  • Props:
    • region- Region, defaults to "null"
    • color- Color, defaults to "BLACK"
  • Returns: Page

# redactRegion(Region region=null, Color color=BLACK)

Redact whole area within region

  • Props:
    • region- Region, defaults to "null"
    • color- Color, defaults to "BLACK"
  • Returns: Page

# redactText(Region region=null, Color color=BLACK)

Redact Text within region

  • Props:
    • region- Region, defaults to "null"
    • color- Color, defaults to "BLACK"
  • Returns: Page
